## Fundamentals

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
P1 = mami.codi(60, num_harmonics = 1, verbose=T)
tibble::tibble_row(
  P1$fundamental_frequency,
  P1$frequencies[[1]] %>% min,
  P1$frequency_alcd
)
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
P8 = mami.codi(c(60,72), num_harmonics = 1, verbose=T)
tibble::tibble_row(
  P8$fundamental_frequency,
  P8$frequencies[[1]] %>% min,
  P8$frequency_alcd
)
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
M3 = mami.codi(c(60, 64), num_harmonics = 1, verbose=T)
tibble::tibble_row(
  M3$fundamental_frequency,
  M3$frequencies[[1]] %>% min,
  M3$frequency_alcd
)
```
